name: create-file
title: Create File
description: Brings the ability to create empty files to Mac! No longer will you have to open a terminal and do `touch <filename>`! Also, has an option to create an empty file straight to clipboard.
author: cyberistic

commands.name: create-file-here
commands.title: Create File Here
commands.subtitle: Create File
commands.description: Create a file with specified name and extension in current directory

preferences.name: disableClipboardFallback
preferences.title: Clipboard Fallback
preferences.description: When enabled, shows an error instead of creating file in /tmp and copying to clipboard when no file explorer is focused
preferences.label: Do not copy to clipboard if no file explorer is focused

commands.name: create-file-to-clipboard
commands.title: Create File to Clipboard
commands.subtitle: Create File
commands.description: Create a file in /tmp and copy it to clipboard

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
